mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Hawaii", "Eskimos and Allemanders Dance", "Convention Coverage", "Journal of a Traveling Caller's Wife", "Americana: The Wreck of Old 97", and "More Helps in the Training of New Callers". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Style Series: The Waist Swing", "The Square Dance Picture", "Round the Outside Ring", "The Caller of the Month: Ralph Kinnane", "Paging the Roundancers: John and Winnie Nash", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
